title: Why a Wayfair Sales Tax Case Sparked Pandemic Windfall
itunes:title: Why a Wayfair Sales Tax Case Sparked Pandemic Windfall
description:
Dr. Joanne Roberts, Chief Value Officer at Providence St. Joseph Health, provides a coronavirus and vaccine update. Bloomberg News Muni Bond Reporter Danielle Moran discusses why a Wayfair sales tax case sparked a pandemic windfall for states. Tracey Travis, CFO at Estée Lauder, shares color on how the makeup company has evolved for women amid the pandemic. And we Drive to the Close with Hilary Kramer, President and CIO at A&G Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
